t=input()
while(t):
    t=t-1
    m=input()
    d=0
    for n in range(1,m):
        s=str(n)
        l=len(s)
        p=n
        for i in range(0,l):
            p=p+int(s[i])
        if p==m:
            print n
            d=1
            break
        
    if d==0:
        print "NONE"
